page.title: 07A Day In My Life Continued.6
page.content: 12.00 and we then all help to tidy up the house then we have lunch which sometimes consists of fish & chips on a Saturday.After I've dried the nappies I now do the next of the washing. Dad and Tracy go shopping to Leeds and get back just in time to stop me from having a nervous breakdown,Sarah is still pinching buns.Charlotte is by now screaming to be fed and changed which I do straight away.Dad takes over doing the dinner.Everyone has to do there own share of the work when I am breastfeeding because it takes up so much of my time,but I have a good understanding family.After dinner,the children go upstairs to play in their bedroom or on the computer.Nearly seven o'clock the best time of the day.Sarah and Alan washed and ready
